nodes.text: The Deepest Woods was the name given to the southern half of the Nightmare Lands on the planet Voss, between the Twisted Forest to the north and the uncorrupted Sha-Thes Meadow to the south beyond the black stone borders of the region. The Cave of Reflection was one of several caves located in the area's deep ravines, and the Char-An Commando Outpost, the only stable outpost within the Nightmare Lands themselves, was located there.
The Deepest Woods appears as an area on Voss in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
